field.name: MAP
field.description: System memory remap. Value 0x3 is reserved

enumeratedValue.name: BOOT_LOADER_MODE
enumeratedValue.description: Boot Loader Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Boot ROM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_RAM_MODE
enumeratedValue.description: User RAM Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Static RAM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_FLASH_MODE
enumeratedValue.description: User Flash Mode. Interrupt vectors are not re-mapped and reside in Flash

field.name: UARTFRG_RST_N
field.description: USART fractional baud rate generator (UARTFRG) reset control

field.name: GPIO_RST_N
field.description: GPIO and GPIO pin interrupt reset control

enumeratedValue.name: CLEAR_THE_ANALOG_COM
enumeratedValue.description: Clear the analog comparator controller reset

field.name: MSEL
field.description: Feedback divider value. The division value M is the programmed MSEL value + 1. 00000: Division ratio M = 1 to 11111: Division ratio M = 32

field.name: PSEL
field.description: Post divider ratio P. The division ratio is 2 x P

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled. PLL input (sys_osc_clk) is fed directly from the XTALIN pin bypassing the oscillator. Use this mode when using an external clock source instead of the crystal oscillator

field.name: DIVSEL
field.description: Select divider for Fclkana. wdt_osc_clk = Fclkana/ (2 x (1 + DIVSEL)) 00000: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 2 00001: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 4 to 11111: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 64

field.name: FREQSEL
field.description: Select watchdog oscillator analog output frequency (Fclkana)

enumeratedValue.name: POR_DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: POR detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: EXTRST
field.description: Status of the external RESET pin. External reset status

enumeratedValue.name: RESET_DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: Reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

enumeratedValue.name: WDT_RESET_DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: WDT reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: BOD
field.description: Status of the Brown-out detect reset

enumeratedValue.name: BOD_RESET_DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: BOD reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

field.name: SYSRST
field.description: Status of the software system reset

enumeratedValue.name: SYSTEM_RESET_DETECTE
enumeratedValue.description: System reset detected. Writing a one clears this reset

register.name: SYSPLLCLKUEN
register.description: System PLL clock source update enable

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable system PLL clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: System AHB clock divider values 0: System clock disabled. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SYS
field.description: Enables the clock for the AHB, the APB bridge, the Cortex-M0+ core clocks, SYSCON, and the PMU. This bit is read only and always reads as 1

field.name: RAM0_1
field.description: Enables clock for SRAM0 and SRAM1

field.name: FLASHREG
field.description: Enables clock for flash register interface

field.name: GPIO
field.description: Enables clock for GPIO port registers and GPIO pin interrupt

field.name: SCT
field.description: Enables clock for state configurable timer SCTimer/PWM

field.name: WKT
field.description: Enables clock for self wake-up timer

field.name: MTB
field.description: Enables clock to micro- trace buffer control registers. Turn on this clock when using the micro-trace buffer for debug purposes

field.name: DIV
field.description: USART fractional baud rate generator clock divider values. 0: Clock disabled. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: CLKOUT clock divider values 0: Disable CLKOUT clock divider. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

register.name: UARTFRGDIV
register.description: USART1 to USART4 common fractional generator divider value

field.name: DIV
field.description: Denominator of the fractional divider. DIV is equal to the programmed value +1. Always set to 0xFF to use with the fractional baud rate generator

register.name: UARTFRGMULT
register.description: USART1 to USART4 common fractional generator multiplier value

field.name: MULT
field.description: Numerator of the fractional divider. MULT is equal to the programmed value

field.name: START
field.description: Trace start command. Writing a one to this bit sets the TSTART signal to the MTB to HIGH and starts tracing if the TSTARTEN bit in the MTB master register is set to one as well

field.name: STOP
field.description: Trace stop command. Writing a one to this bit sets the TSTOP signal in the MTB to HIGH and stops tracing if the TSTOPEN bit in the MTB master register is set to one as well

field.name: PIOSTAT
field.description: State of PIO0_17 through PIO0_0 at power-on reset

register.name: IOCONCLKDIV6
register.description: Peripheral clock 6 to the IOCON block for programmable glitch filter

field.name: DIV
field.description: IOCON glitch filter clock divider values 0: Disable IOCONFILTR_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

register.name: IRQLATENCY
register.description: IQR delay. Allows trade-off between interrupt latency and determinism

field.name: IRQN
field.description: The IRQ number of the interrupt that acts as the Non-Maskable Interrupt (NMI) if bit 31 is 1. See Table 3 for the list of interrupt sources and their IRQ numbers

field.name: NMIEN
field.description: Write a 1 to this bit to enable the Non-Maskable Interrupt (NMI) source selected by bits 4:0

field.name: INTPIN
field.description: Pin number select for pin interrupt or pattern match engine input. (PIO0_0 to PIO0_28 correspond to numbers 0 to 28)

register.name: STARTERP0
register.description: Start logic 0 pin wake-up enable register

register.name: STARTERP1
register.description: Start logic 1 interrupt wake-up enable register

field.name: USART0
field.description: USART0 interrupt wake-up. Configure USART in synchronous slave mode

field.name: USART1
field.description: USART1 interrupt wake-up. Configure USART in synchronous slave mode

field.name: USART2
field.description: USART2 interrupt wake-up. Configure USART in synchronous slave mode

field.name: BOD_PD
field.description: BOD power-down control for Deep-sleep and Power-down mode

field.name: WDTOSC_PD
field.description: Watchdog oscillator power-down control for Deep-sleep and Power-down mode. Changing this bit to powered-down has no effect when the LOCK bit in the WWDT MOD register is set. In this case, the watchdog oscillator is always running

register.name: PDAWAKECFG
register.description: Power-down states for wake-up from deep-sleep

field.name: WDTOSC_PD
field.description: Watchdog oscillator wake-up configuration. Changing this bit to powered-down has no effect when the LOCK bit in the WWDT MOD register is set. In this case, the watchdog oscillator is always running

field.name: SYSOSC_PD
field.description: Crystal oscillator power down. After power-up, add a software delay of approximately 500 us before using

field.name: WDTOSC_PD
field.description: Watchdog oscillator power down. Changing this bit to powered-down has no effect when the LOCK bit in the WWDT MOD register is set. In this case, the watchdog oscillator is always running
